original_text: I also thought about the clever work that people do. I saw that people work hard because they are jealous of each other. They want to do better than other people. I realized that this has no purpose. It is like somebody who tries to catch the wind. I also thought about the clever work that people do. I saw that people work hard because they are jealous of each other. They want to do better than other people. I realized that this has no purpose. It is like somebody who tries to catch the wind.
korean_text: 내가 또 본즉 사람이 모든 수고와 모든 재주로 말미암아 이웃에게 시기를 받으니 이것도 헛되어 바람을 잡는 것이로다

sentences.original_text: I also thought about the clever work that people do
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 또한 사람들이 하는 교묘한 일에 대해 생각했다

sentences.original_text: I saw that people work hard because they are jealous of each other
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 사람들이 서로 질투하기 때문에 열심히 일한다는 것을 보았다

sentences.original_text: They want to do better than other people
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 다른 사람보다 더 잘하고 싶어한다

sentences.original_text: I realized that this has no purpose
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 이것이 아무 목적이 없다는 것을 깨달았다

sentences.original_text: It is like somebody who tries to catch the wind
